Text: Urk...!
*gasp*
*pant, pant*
What's gotten into that girl...

It would seem Rose has fled to the north of the
capital. She may still be in the city.
Damn...

Oriana wants to handle this as an internal affair and
requested that Midgar not get involved.
That's suspicious.

Very. Rose is merely a student and not a diplomat,
so normally she would be subject to Midgar law.

But if that were to happen, it would most likely
strain relations between the two kingdoms.

Well, I'm sure my father will probably wait and see.
He's pretty much the picture of not rocking the boat.

Rose's betrothed is Perv Asshat, the second son of
one of the Oriana Kingdom's dukes.

If she is arrested for harming him, her punishment
will naturally be quite severe.

She's royalty, so it's not like she'll get the death
penalty, but still...

At any rate, let's find Rose before the Kingdom does
and hear what she has to say for herself.
Wait. She didn't speak about this to either of us.
So?

It's possible that she was trying to prevent us from
intervening and sparking an international incident,
so it may be best if we refrain from doing anything
rash.
You're saying we should abandon her?

Not in the slightest. I'm merely suggesting that we
think carefully before we act.

What, are you implying that I'm some kind of
brainless moron?
If you have something to say, by all means say it.
I would never think to insult someone so gracious asâ€”
Don't you play innocent with me!

Alexia grabs Natsume by the collar, causing the two
masses peeking through her open shirt to jiggle.
Eek, don't kill me...!
I know you're just acting.
Eep...
I'm gonna kill you.
Oh dear...

Clicking her tongue in annoyance, Alexia lets go of
the teary-eyed Natsume.

I know Rose doesn't want to get us involved, and that
pisses me off.
O-Okay?
I mean, we're allies.

I don't have any way of knowing how you two really
feel about the matter, but we've decided to work as
a team now. Right?
*sigh*

That's why I can't just abandon Rose. And it goes
without saying I wouldn't abandon you either. Got
that?

Well, I'll see what information I can find on Rose.
I've heard some dark rumors about Perv Asshat,
so I'll look into those, too.
Didn't take you long to bounce back...
Anyway, I'll start by speaking with my sister.
Be careful out there.
You as well.
...Not much fazes you, huh.
Oh well, guess we'll just have to do what we can...

Spread around a little more information about Perv
Asshat and the Orianan royal family.
Are you certain?

Giving her more details to take into account ought to
slow her down a bit. I don't want the little princess
whipping us into action just yet.
Now, what of Rose Oriana?

Reports indicate she entered the underground ruins
via the sewers. The passages there are winding and
complex, so she likely thinks it an ideal location to
hide herself.

Continue tracking her location, even if it's just the
general area.
Understood.
Beta frowns as she reads over the report.

Multiple confirmations of her clutching her chest as
she fled...
